Additional collection material added regularly. Submaster and Data DVDs stored in Box 1 and Box 2This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace 2022-01-19T19:01:28Description is in English.
English .
Fales Library and Special Collections
Fales Library Events Video Collection
Fales Library
MSS.307
6 Linear Feet
1990-2016
Historical Note
The Fales Library Events Video Collection contains video and audio of events either arranged by or held at the Fales Library relating to the Fales Library, Fales archival collections and/or the Fales Food Studies Series.
Arrangement
This collection is divided into three series:
Missing Title
Fales Events Videos
Fales Food Studies Events
Submasters (Restricted Access)
Conditions Governing Access
Open to researchers. Appointments are necessary for the use of manuscript and archival collections.
Conditions Governing Use
Collection use is subject to all copyright laws. Permission to publish materials must be obtained in writing from the Director of Fales Library and Special Collections. Please contact fales.library@nyu.edu. or call 212 998 2596.
Preferred Citation
Published citations should take the following form:
Identification of item, date (if known); Fales Library Events Video Collection; MSS 307; box number; folder number; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University Libraries.
Scope and Content
This collection contains video and audio of events either arranged by or held at Fales Library. Series I: Fales Events VideosACT UP; Read My Lips; Fales LibraryID: FA0001UndatedFA0001
